decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (51b Fruen Road Plan, Location Plan received 27/06/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the submitted plans a pedestrian refuge and bollards, details of which shall have been agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority prior to the first use of the crossover hereby approved. These features shall be thereafter be installed in accordance with the approved details and retained permanently
